action.comment: Authorize the user to see the model based search.
Give the user the necessary role.

component.tab-path: Administration > Berechtigungen > Benutzerrechte > Nutzerrechte auf Strukturen pflegen

action.comment: Give the role the necessary rights.
Create Demo A for the user 'Jan Stolzenburg'.
Create Demo A for the user 'root'.
Create Demo A for the user 'TestPredefinedSearchParameters-User'.
Check the search result with the user 'root'.
Check the search result with the other user.
Take the right away from the role.
Take the role away from the user.

component.tab-path: Administration > Berechtigungen > Benutzerrechte > Nutzerrechte auf Strukturen pflegen
